metadata.title: CVE-2016-3899 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OMXCodec.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4,5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-09-01, and 7.0before 2016-09-01 does not validate a certain pointer, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via acrafted media file, aka internal bug 29421811.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
